title: EU backs indefinite freeze on Russia's frozen cash ahead of loan plan for Ukraine
subtitle: After almost four years of Russia's full-scale war, Kyiv is running out of cash, and needs an estimated €135.7bn over the next two years.
full_text: After almost four years of Russia's full-scale war, Kyiv is running out of cash, and needs an estimated €135.7bn over the next two years.
